alert.note: Alert for Northern Monterey Bay; Northern Salinas Valley, Hollister Valley and Carmel Valley; Southern Monterey Bay and Big Sur Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 05 at 4:36AM PDT by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...Patchy Dense Fog Possible This Morning... Patchy fog has developed along portions of Monterey Bay and within the Salinas Valley. Visibility reductions to around 1/2 mile have been observed, with reductions to around 1/4 mile possible in spots. Patchy fog should persist through mid morning. Motorists are advised to drive with caution as visibilities may widely vary over short distances. Use low beam headlights and leave extra distance between your vehicle and others on the road when encountering significant reductions in visibility. Allow extra time to travel to destinations.

area.areaDesc: Northern Monterey Bay; Northern Salinas Valley, Hollister Valley and Carmel Valley; Southern Monterey Bay and Big Sur Coast
